languages.text: For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons. Strength also affects the Athletics skill (base Athletics is equal to Strength).
languages.original_text: За каждую единицу бонуса Силы персонаж наносит дополнительно +5% урона одноручным оружием ближнего боя и +10% урона двуручным оружием ближнего боя. Эта характеристика также влияет на навык Атлетика (базовое значение Атлетики равно значению Силы).

traits.locale_text: Every 10 points in Strength (STR) adds +1 damage to melee attacks. It also affects the Athletics skill (base Athletics is equal to the Strength).

For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons. Strength also affects the Athletics skill (base Athletics is equal to Strength).

For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons. Strength also affects the Athletics skill (base Athletics is equal to Strength).

languages.text: За каждую единицу бонуса Силы персонаж наносит дополнительно +5% урона одноручным оружием ближнего боя и +10% урона двуручным оружием ближнего боя. Эта характеристика также влияет на навык Атлетика (базовое значение Атлетики равно значению Силы).

Por cada punto de bonificación de Fuerza, los personajes infligen un +5 % más de daño con armas cuerpo a cuerpo de una mano y +10 % más de daño con armas cuerpo a cuerpo a dos manos. La Fuerza también afecta a la habilidad Atletismo (la base de Atletismo es igual a la Fuerza).
languages.original_text: For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons. Strength also affects the Athletics skill (base Athletics is equal to Strength).

traits.locale_text: Por cada punto de bonificación de Fuerza, los personajes infligen un +5 % más de daño con armas cuerpo a cuerpo de una mano y +10 % más de daño con armas cuerpo a cuerpo a dos manos. La Fuerza también afecta a la habilidad Atletismo (la base de Atletismo es igual a la Fuerza).

languages.text: 每有1点力量加值，角色的单手近战武器伤害提高5%，双手近战武器伤害提高10%。此外，力量还会影响运动技能（基础运动技能等同于力量）。
languages.original_text: For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons. Strength also affects the Athletics skill (base Athletics is equal to Strength).

traits.locale_text: 每有1点力量加值，角色的单手近战武器伤害提高5%，双手近战武器伤害提高10%。此外，力量还会影响运动技能（基础运动技能等同于力量）。

languages.text: 腕力ボーナス1ポイントにつき、片手持ち近接武器で与えるダメージが＋5％、両手持ち近接武器で与えるダメージが＋10％増加する。腕力は身体能力スキルにも影響する（基本身体能力は腕力に等しい）。
languages.original_text: For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons. Strength also affects the Athletics skill (base Athletics is equal to Strength).

traits.locale_text: 腕力ボーナス1ポイントにつき、片手持ち近接武器で与えるダメージが＋5％、両手持ち近接武器で与えるダメージが＋10％増加する。腕力は身体能力スキルにも影響する（基本身体能力は腕力に等しい）。

languages.text: Je Punkt eines Stärke-Bonus verursachen Charaktere mit einhändigen Nahkampfwaffen +5 % mehr Schaden und mit zweihändigen Nahkampfwaffen +10 % mehr Schaden. Stärke wirkt sich auch auf die Fertigkeit Athletik aus (der Grundwert für Athletik entspricht der Stärke).
languages.original_text: For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons. Strength also affects the Athletics skill (base Athletics is equal to Strength).

traits.locale_text: Je Punkt eines Stärke-Bonus verursachen Charaktere mit einhändigen Nahkampfwaffen +5 % mehr Schaden und mit zweihändigen Nahkampfwaffen +10 % mehr Schaden. Stärke wirkt sich auch auf die Fertigkeit Athletik aus (der Grundwert für Athletik entspricht der Stärke).

languages.text: Pour chaque point bonus de Force, les personnages infligent +5 % de dégâts supplémentaires avec les armes de mêlée à une main et +10 % de dégâts supplémentaires avec les armes de mêlée à deux mains. La Force influe également sur la compétence Athlétisme, la compétence Athlétisme de base étant égale à la Force.
languages.original_text: For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons. Strength also affects the Athletics skill (base Athletics is equal to Strength).

La Force influe également sur la compétence Athlétisme, la compétence Athlétisme de base étant égale à la Force.

La Force influe également sur la compétence Athlétisme, la compétence Athlétisme de base étant égale à la Force.

languages.text: Karakter sahip olduğu her ilave Kuvvet puanı sayesinde tek el yakın dövüş silahlarıyla %5, çift el yakın dövüş silahlarıyla ise %10 daha fazla hasar verir. Kuvvet, ayrıca Atletizm yeteneğine de etki eder (Taban Atletizm değeri Kuvvet'e eşittir).
languages.original_text: For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons. Strength also affects the Athletics skill (base Athletics is equal to Strength).
